short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Commanders Act Assistant helps to troubleshoot TagCommander implementation and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Commanders Act Assistant helps you verify that your technical team has implemented the container(s) and the datalayer correctly on your page. Just navigate to any page and TagCommander Assistant will tell you which container(s) and tags are present, which variables are present with their value, which cookies are used and which hits and scripts are called. TagCommander Assistant also provides the ability to switch from one version of container to another in order to simulate a new or old container version in a LIVE environment.
